jump_scares.spoiler: One of the captives gets dragged away suddenly

After opening a secret cupboard, a doll pops out startling Beth and Vera
Accompanied by a sound effect, we see the candy truck’s lights in the distance
A large man suddenly runs at Pauline while she is on the phone
As Beth attempts to get up, the door is suddenly slammed in her face
A bloodied hand appears on the door handle
A screaming Vera bursts through the door and tackles Beth
Beth turns to see a doll watching her in the hallway
The doll starts laughing maniacally and Beth suddenly wakes from a nightmare
As Beth looks through the keyhole, a figure suddenly appears in front of it
A screaming Vera runs out of the room
Someone bangs on the door grate from the other side as Beth tries to talk to her sister
Beth turns to see the fat man walk past her in the hallway
Beth says “Mom?” before she is attacked from behind
After opening the door to the cupboard slowly, the mysterious woman rushes at Beth
There is a bang on the door as Beth tries to open it
The fat man grabs Beth
As Beth listens by the door, a hammer comes crashing through from the other side
The doll starts laughing beside Beth who is hiding in a closet
During a tense scene the doll starts laughing once more
A man is suddenly shot
As Beth runs towards Vera she suddenly finds herself back in reality as she crashes through a mirror
Just as in the original Austrian version, the title card appears on screen alongside loud heavy metal music which will likely startle those with the sound turned up
The title card flashes up on screen accompanied by loud heavy metal music  while not a jump scare as such those listening with the volume up may be startled
A knock is heard at Seylan’s door, which is revealed to just be a late delivery
Jemma suddenly screams loudly as she claims to have felt something touch her neck
Haley is suddenly dragged backwards in her chair
A loud thud is heard
Emma’s drinking glass suddenly shatters
A warbling sound is heard as the lights in everyone’s rooms begin to flicker
Caroline becomes visible through her virtual background as she appears to fall towards the webcam, knocking the laptop over
Emma’s camera pans down and a floating face filter is seen
Emma’s cabinet doors burst open
Alan’s body falls to the floor behind Radina
Caroline once again becomes visible through her virtual background as she starts repeatedly slamming her head
Haley’s chair gets pulled away
A mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view
Another mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view as loud screaming is heard
Thudding is heard in the distance
Teddy’s flashlight explodes
A scream is heard as another explosion occurs, blowing Teddy backwards
Emma screams loudly after she throws a blanket and it lands in mid-air
A window shatters off-screen as Jemma breaks into Haley’s house
Jemma’s hand reaches for the camera
Haley’s cabinets and drawers burst open
Hayley appears from under the desk as her chair knocks over
As Haley snaps a portrait, a mysterious and bloodied figure suddenly screams and lunges towards her and Jemma, but is then abruptly cut off due to the Zoom meeting reaching its time limit
Sarah bangs loudly on the door
The killer’s face appears at a window as Maddie tries to leave the house
The killer appears in front of a window
The killer appears around the corner of the house
The killer walks past a window
The killer appears at the window just as Sarah closes it
John suddenly gets up and tackles the killer
A car suddenly crashes into the back of Kylie’s car
The driver of the white car walks up to Kylie’s window, accompanied with a loud musical sting
The computer that Kylie’s using, short-circuits
The freezer makes a mechanical noise, startling Kylie
A statue of Jesus wrapped in a white sheet stumbles and falls towards Kylie
After Kylie’s ankle bracelet beeps, grabbing her attention, a diseased-looking hand comes out from under a piece of furniture and grabs her leg
While she’s in the shower, Kylie crouches and is then attacked by the possessed teddy bear, accompanied by a loud musical sting
Graham startles Kylie while she’s dancing
The lights come back on and a veiled figure suddenly appears besides Dennis, accompanied by a loud musical stinger
While Amos is trying to look through the presumed killer’s window, Kylie suddenly opens it from inside, startling Amos in the process, accompanied by a musical stinger
The flash from Amos’s camera reveals the presumed killer’s silhouette standing behind a window, staring at Amos. This is accompanied by a loud musical stinger
The burned teddy bear in the back of Amos’s car suddenly starts to speak and startles him, accompanied by a musical stinger
Eugene slams into the door of the pick-up truck just as Kylie closes it. Accompanied by a musical stinger
Kylie turns around and Miriam suddenly appears in front of her
A sudden scene transition from a silent scene to Kylie loudly and violently opening a kitchen shelf may startle some viewers
Dennis suddenly goes on the attack, accompanied by a musical stinger
Miriam opens a cupboard in the bathroom and Eugene stumbles out of it, prompting both of them to scream. Close-up on Miriam’s face as she’s screaming. Accompanied by a musical stinger
After stabbing Eugene through the wall, Dennis suddenly kicks down the wall
Dennis suddenly comes out of frame and punches Kylie unconscious
A man appears in front of the car and gets hit
For the next one-and-a-half-minutes there is a fast montage of flashy, sometimes scary looking images
The body-double suddenly opens his eyes
There is a sudden cut to a man shooting a vase
There is an abrupt cut to JP breaking open a door
A knife pierces some wood
Anna suddenly appears behind Perry
The sight of various body parts in a freezer may startle some viewers
A shadowy figure appears behind Meera
There is a loud gunshot
A barking dog lunges at the car window
A car horn sounds and a car crashes into Meera
Meera looks up to see a masked man pointing a gun at her
A hand suddenly knocks on the car window

Meera switches on a light to reveal a person tied to a chair
Christina suddenly wakes up and Meera screams
Meera turns around to run and immediately runs into Henry
Henry suddenly grabs Meera by the shoulder and throws her
Meera suddenly Strikes Henry from behind
Sarah imagines her husband is still with her until she has a flashback of the car incident
Sarah is startled by a loud noise which triggers her to spot a silhouette in the window

The officer screams at Sarah

A sudden sound of a blender coming from the kitchen

Maddie suddenly appears at the window
A body with a bloodied face falls from the ceiling
Accompanied by a screech, a mysterious figure can be seen downstairs suddenly running from one side to the other
As Madison turns after putting clothes in the washer, a screaming woman suddenly appears on the other side of the washer door glass
As the prisoner tries to cut her ropes, a trophy/dagger is thrown landing in a wooden post and just missing her face
A shadowy figure suddenly appears
A carriage suddenly moves, accompanied by a sound
Gabriel suddenly jumps down from his hiding place
An escaping woman falls through the attic floor
As Madison shouts and gets angry, the lights in the interrogation room explode
A lot of light bulbs in the police station explode all at once
The hospital security guard’s pacemaker explodes out of his chest

There is a music cue as Mary looks up
A hand comes out of the toilet and grabs Mary’s arm

Kaylee’s eyeless and mouthless face suddenly appears on screen with a loud droning whine sound
The shot of the toy phone cuts to a near identical shot where the phone is smiling wider and looking at the camera, accompanied by a loud ringing
A large gush of blood spills out of the hall accompanied by a scream. This shot repeats 3 times
Alicia’s boyfriend appears behind the car window and bangs on it, startling her
As Alicia slowly reaches her hand towards the old man’s dead body, there is a sudden thud that scares her and makes her pull her hand back
Alicia’s phone suddenly starts ringing during a quiet scene
While Alicia is looking out the peephole, the killer’s axe suddenly slams into the door from the side
Alicia peeks downwards from the ledge and there is suddenly a cut to the killer lighting a flare in front of her
The seemingly dead killer suddenly springs back up and grabs Alicia on the ankle

As Cecilia tilts the bucket of white paint from the attic, the invisible man suddenly appears right in front of her

Accompanied by a sound effect, a man appears on the road
